definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[ערשׂ]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. 9ar4un booth, shed, throne, 9ariy4un grape-trellis, woman's (camel-) saddle; Eth. 9ara3: booth (? also 9ar4t: bed); As. irsûu, bed, couch; NH [[עֲרִיסָה]] cradle, Targum [[עַרְסָא]], Syr. 9arso0, Palm. [[ערשא]]; the common idea is appar. that of a wooden structure, frame, cf. Nö:ZMG xi (1886), 737).
